PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ElementKinematics
PropertySetDef.Definition: Information confirming that the element has cyclic and/or pathed kinematic behaviour. The resulting envelope may be available as a 'clearance' shape representation.

PropertyDef.Name: CyclicPath
PropertyDef.Definition: Represents the time:angle table of the kinematic behaviour.

PropertyDef.Name: CyclicRange
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the angular range of the kinematic behaviour

PropertyDef.Name: LinearPath
PropertyDef.Definition: Represents the time:distance table of the kinematic behaviour.

PropertyDef.Name: LinearRange
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the linear range of the kinematic behaviour.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumAngularVelocity
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the maximum angular velocity of the kinematic behaviour.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumConstantSpeed
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the maximum constant speed over the kinematic path.

PropertyDef.Name: MinimumTime
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the minimum time for the kinematic behaviour.
